entities.name: ron
entities.description: The main character of the story, Ron, is described as approaching the counter and talking to a witch.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's rat who has been acting strangely since being brought back from Egypt.

entities.name: witch
entities.description: The witch is described as wearing heavy black spectacles and giving advice to Ron.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is Ron's brother who previously owned Scabbers.

entities.name: egypt
entities.description: Egypt is mentioned as the place where Ron brought Scabbers back from.

relationships.description: The witch examines Scabbers to determine the cause of his strange behavior.
Ron is the brother of Percy, who previously owned Scabbers.
Ron traveled to Egypt and brought Scabbers back with him.
